entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow this evening. Local rainfall amount 5 mm. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 11 April 2023
